DOC.brief_summary: This study is comparing 2 medications for glaucoma and how effective they are at controlling glaucoma over the course of an entire day.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of the Effects of Two Glaucoma Drugs Over 24 Hours (0507A-137)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients with glaucoma or ocular hypertension Other eye conditions Poor vision Recent eye surgery Use of contact lenses Nursing or pregnant women Use of some other selected medications Drug or alcohol abuse Asthma Slow heart beat Allergy or previous reaction to study drugs
DOC.keyword: Ocular hypertension (excessive pressure in the eye)
